top_issues: Screen renders as a completely black/blank void
No visible UI elements, navigation, or content
Complete lack of visual hierarchy or information architecture
Zero accessibility support due to missing content
top_fixes: Investigate view rendering pipeline for obstruction or occlusion
Verify window content is being drawn to the surface
Check for uninitialized view controllers or zero-sized frames
quick_wins: Ensure the 'Settings' view is actually attached to the window
Verify background color is not obscuring foreground content
